reviewText:
Sandra Ingerman provides a good overview of Shamanism. This home recording could be set up better and be not so monotone.
I learned alot though. She has a strong base to share with those interested in Shamanism.

I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this DVD.
Sandra Ingerman is unpretentious, sincere, genuine and passionate about her work.  Her presentation has inspired me to explore Shamanism in more depth....even signing up for her workshop in SantaFe New Mexico this November.

For anyone with an interest in Shamanism and would like to learn more from someone who has a wide range and deep expereince with this subject, you will certainly not be disappointed.  Sandra' books are also excellent, however hearing and seeing her speak, one is able to get a glimpse of her gentle radiance.

No one is better able to make complicated subjects as clear and "simple" as Sandra Ingerman. She is a gifted teacher and shamanic practioner.  This DVD allows those who have never had the privilege of studying with her in person to have the next best thing.
